title: Teaching Reading and Language Arts with a Multicultural Perspective
description: Development of knowledge and skills for planning, teaching, and assessing a balanced, comprehensive, research-based K-8 reading and language arts program. State/national standards and trends. Attention to children of all abilities and backgrounds. PACT assessment task and RICA preparation. 4 seminars, 2 activities.
prerequisites: Admission into the Multiple Subject Credential Program
